title: Dashboard
description: In tabbed layout view, control buttons does not get displayed

description.text: Changes in comments doesn't get displayed in notifications
Sorting does not work well for Jira list types like Status, Priority, Resolution, etc..

When worklog is added from worklog report, the report doesn't gets updated with new additions until the report is refreshed
